title: About
intro: Hi there! I'm Prakash Raj, a passionate web developer, data scientist, and open source enthusiast.
description: Currently pursuing my Bachelor of Technology's in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence at ICFAI University Jaipur. I'm deeply passionate about building modern web experiences and tackling complex data challenges through code.

As an active open source contributor, I work extensively with modern web technologies including Astro, TypeScript, JavaScript, and React. I believe in the power of community-driven development and love contributing to projects that make the web more accessible and performant.

My technical journey spans from crafting pixel-perfect user interfaces with HTML, CSS, and modern frameworks to diving deep into Python for data science applications. I'm always excited to bridge the gap between beautiful design and robust functionality.
